meanings.definition: Moving or tending to move away from a center.
meanings.sent1: The centrifugals force pushed the objects outward.
meanings.sent2: The centrifugals motion of the planets keeps them in orbit.
meanings.sent3: The centrifugals effect made the dancers spin faster than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her centrifugals energy radiated outwards like a burst of light.
meanings.sent5: The centrifugals movement of the toy car was swift and steady.

meanings.sent2: The centrifugals in the lab were essential for the experiment.

meanings.sent4: The centrifugals whirred like a busy bee as it worked its magic.

meanings.definition: A force that tends to move objects away from a center of rotation.
meanings.sent1: The centrifugals of the spinning top made it wobble.
meanings.sent2: The centrifugals of the amusement park ride pushed riders to the edges.
meanings.sent3: The centrifugals of the merry-go-round made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The centrifugals of the tornado scattered debris in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The centrifugals of the spinning wheel flung droplets of water around.
